item.title: Busy on-ramp to I-75 will close
item.description: Overnight roadwork to close a busy I-75 on-ramp Tuesday night.

item.title: Sunken boat rescue in Hillsborough County
item.description: Sunken boat rescue in Hillsborough County

item.title: K-Pop fans celebrate the return of BTS with a rare performance in Tampa
item.description: BTS had been nominated for five Grammys and had won 12 Billboard Music Awards.

item.title: Manatee County to discuss plan to buy Mixon Fruit Farm
item.description: The 39-acre farm has been a popular tourist destination and event venue for decades.

item.title: Two People, two dogs rescued after boat sinks at Morris Bridge Park
item.description: A tree blocking the river delayed rescue efforts by the dive boat team.

item.title: Man gets 10 years for shooting into building of business that fired him
item.description: Two days after the firing, bullet holes were found in the front window of the building.

item.title: Rollover crash causes massive backup on I-75
item.description: Truck rolls over on I-75 southbound, backing up traffic for miles.

item.title: Boat operator involved in Clearwater Ferry crash arrested, faces multiple charges
item.description: Jeffry Knight was arrested Monday afternoon and charged with eight felonies, the FWC said.

item.title: Two seriously injured in I-75 crash
item.description: The crash backed up traffic more than six miles, crating major delays during the afternoon rush hour.

item.title: Man drowns at party at Bradenton apartment complex
item.description: The investigation has revealed no signs of foul play.

item.title: Extreme heat continues but change is coming
item.description: Tampa set an all-time high on Sunday reaching 100 degrees for the first time ever in its history.
